geometry.planar

Class Simplex

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.PolylineShape
      • geometry.planar.TileShape
        • geometry.planar.Simplex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Area, ConvexShape, Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class Simplex
extends TileShape
implements java.io.Serializable
    Convex shape defined as intersection of half-planes. A half-plane is defined as the positive side of a directed line.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Simplex EMPTY
      Standard implementation for an empty Simplex.

      • EMPTY

        public static final Simplex EMPTY
        Standard implementation for an empty Simplex.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simplex

        public Simplex(Line[] p_line_arr)
        Constructs a Simplex from the directed lines in p_line_arr. The simplex will not be normalized. To get a normalised simplex use TileShape.get_instance
        Parameters:
        p_line_arr - an array of Line objects.

      • corner

        public Point corner(int p_no)
        Returns the p_no-th corner of this shape for p_no between 0 and border_line_count() - 1. The corners are sorted starting with the smallest y-coordinate in counterclock sense arount the shape. If there are several corners with the smallest y-coordinate, the corner with the smallest x-coordinate comes first. Consecutive corners may be equal. Returns the intersection of the p_no -1-th with the p_no-th line of this simplex. If the simplex is not bounded at this corner, the coordinates of the result will be set to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Specified by:
        corner in class PolylineShape
        Parameters:
        p_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a Point object.

      • corner_approx

        public FloatPoint corner_approx(int p_no)
        Returns an approximation of the p_no-th corner of this shape for p_no between 0 and border_line_count() - 1. If the shape is not bounded at this corner, the coordinates of the result will be set to Integer.MAX_VALUE. Returns an approximation of the intersection of the p_no -1-th with the p_no-th line of this simplex by a FloatPoint. If the simplex is not bounded at this corner, the coordinates of the result will be set to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Overrides:
        corner_approx in class PolylineShape
        Parameters:
        p_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a FloatPoint object.

      • border_line

        public Line border_line(int p_no)
        Returns the p_no-th border line of this shape. Returns the p_no-th edge line of this shape for p_no between 0 and edge_line_count() - 1. The edge lines are sorted in counterclock sense around the shape starting with the edge with the smallest direction. returns the p_no-th edge line of this simplex. The edge lines are sorted in ascending direction.
        Specified by:
        border_line in class TileShape
        Parameters:
        p_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a Line object.

      • dimension

        public int dimension()
        Returns the dimension of this simplex. The result may be 2, 1, 0, or -1 (if the simplex is empty).

      • offset

        public Simplex offset(double p_width)
        Calculates the offset shape by p_distance. If p_distance > 0, the shape will be enlarged, else the result shape will be smaller. Returns the simplex offseted by p_with. If p_width > 0, the offset is to the outer, else to the inner.
        Specified by:
        offset in interface ConvexShape
        Parameters:
        p_width - a double.
        Returns:
        a ConvexShape object.

      • enlarge

        public Simplex enlarge(double p_offset)
        Returns the offset shape of this shape by offseting the boundary by p_distance to the outside. The result instsnce may be of a different class than this instance. (For example an enlarged IntBox is an IntOctagon). Returns this simplex enlarged by p_offset. The result simplex is intersected with the by p_offset enlarged bounding octagon of this simplex
        Specified by:
        enlarge in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        p_offset - a double.
        Returns:
        a Shape object.

      • index_of_right_most_corner

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a int.

      • border_line_index

        public int border_line_index(Line p_line)
        if p_line is a borderline of this shape the number of that edge is returned, otherwise -1 if p_line is a borderline of this simplex the number of that edge is returned, otherwise -1

      • remove_border_line

        public Simplex remove_border_line(int p_no)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a Simplex object.

      • cutout_from

        public Simplex[] cutout_from(Simplex p_outer_simplex)
        cuts this simplex out of p_outer_simplex. Divides the resulting shape into simplices along the minimal distance lines from the vertices of the inner simplex to the outer simplex; Returns the convex pieces constructed by this division.
        Parameters:
        p_outer_simplex - a Simplex object.
        Returns:
        an array of Simplex objects.
